reviews.review:
amazing story, one of the best valve games there is on steam. the story is so immersive and you really get a feel for what it is like being gordon freeman. just walking around and hearing people in utter shock because of your appearance. just the way they doctor kleiner at the start says “great scott, gordon freeman! i expected more warning”. 
the game has many different chapters that all have their unique features. the music helps the immersiveness of the game, along with most source games. This is probably one of the best story based games i’ve ever played. I definitely recommend if you want a high action and intense game with lots of story and depth.
exelente juego uno de mis favoritas
ill probably toaster bath before hl3 comes out still fun tho

Finally played this game after 18 years. I went in completely blind, only really knowing about the gravity gun, headcrabs, and other such things that I'd seen in GMod videos of years past. I had no real expectations good or bad, but I can easily say that I absolutely loved it, and can't wait to play Episodes One and Two.

It's well worth your time, especially for how cheap you can pick it up during any sale. I got it from The Orange Box during this past sale when it was 80% off, an absolute steal. Couldn't recommend it more, The Orange Box in particular if you've never given the original Portal a chance either. I had but was pleasantly surprised to see, that even with the warning during checkout that I would not receive an extra copy of Portal since it was already in my library, randomly the next day, I got a giftable copy of Portal anyways! Seriously, if you’ve never bothered with The Orange Box or any of Valve’s older classics, wait until the next big sale and pick it up, you'll be happy you did.
peak life 2 best game in franchise 11/10

abolish the goverment 2 part 3 coming never

Half life 2 un icónico juego que no habia jugado hasta ahora... 2022... es mejor llegar tarde que nunca. Lo he disfrutado un montón y es que veo un esfuerzo para que el juego sea algo trepidante y emocionante en cada fase, en cada momento, tiene persecuciones con lancha, un barrio de horror total, coche, lideras unos bichos tipos starship troopers,... y derrepente llega una guerra urbana... total y mucho más...

Lo que me parece un poco raro, es que teniendo una historia tan rica, en el juego en sí no te lo explican correctamente, el diseño de niveles y la transición entre ellos impecable, pero las lineas de texto y la explicación es un poco decepcionante... lo que quiero decir es que es más divertido leer la historia en la wikipedia, que la historia que realmente te revela el juego... que es casi nada... eso no me gustó.

El toque negativo, para mi gusto son los actores de doblaje, no lo he jugado en inglés, pero son... muy malos en español... el sonido y la musica están muy bien...

pues eso, juégalo aunque sea 2022... lo vas a pasar bien!!
Si la perfección tuviera forma seria literalmente Half Life 2

Un clásico de los videojuegos, un imprescindible en la biblioteca de todo jugador nacido en los 80. Fue muy innovador para su tiempo y un adelantado, introduciendo una historia con mucho jugo e interesante. No te arrepentirás.

Jogo incrível que é lembrado e jogado por muitos até hoje. O salto que o segundo jogo da franquia deu em comparação com o primeiro é gigantesco, em questão de gráficos, sons, gameplay, atmosfera. No geral, é melhor que o primeiro em TUDO.
Классная игра. Всем советую. Уже собрал почти все ачивки (кроме той, где по пляжу нельзя ходить). Хоть и раньше была эта великолепная игра, но только недавно её купил. Всем советую.
A good game ahead of its time,  good gameplay best fps shouter
不知道为什么 玩一会就头晕 但是还是想玩 因为他们叫我戈登博士 我很舒服 他们都很尊敬我

DUDE WHEN I WAS AT THE CHAPTER WHERE I WAS NOT SUPPOSED TO LET BREEN GO AWAY, I DIDN'T KNO WHAT TO DO. ALYX JUST SAID "hUrRy Do tHe ThInG bEfOrE hE eScApEs!" NO INSTURICTIONS, NO CLEAR GOAL, JUST DO THE THING! I LIKEN'T THE GAME. ):<
过瘾，虽然画质与现今相比要低少许，但画面还是很震撼的，很难想象是个04年的游戏。

Um dos jogos mais importantes da história dos videogames.

E também é muito legal brincar com a Gravity Gun.

Totalmente recomendado!

Вот я и прошёл легендарную Half Life 2.
Да-да, только сейчас. Запускал её много раз, но всегда почему-то дропал.

И что могу сказать, в общем и целом, игра отлично выглядит, а самое главное, играется даже в 2к22 году. Но всё-же, некоторые нюансы есть и если не делать скидку на время, то вторая халва далека от идеала. И я даже сделал для себя один вывод - первая часть мне нравится больше. 

И я понял почему раньше дропал игру. Из-за максимально душных эпизодов с покатушками на машине. А это, на минуточку, примерно треть игры. Потом боссы-вертолёты - их очень много. Ты убиваешь одного, потом второго и так вплоть до ачивки - "убить 5 вертолетов". Это весело только в первый раз - потом становится скучным.

Но вот первые 4 часа игры - это прям чистый кайф. Атмосфера антиутопии, крутая постановка сцен, экшен, драйв. Просто игра потом заметно проседает. Головоломок много, но в 1 части они были сложнее и интереснее.

Bu kült yapımda emeği geçen herkesin elini ayağını yalalayım, tercihen Valve'nin Asya oyun camiasından bünyesine kattığı 
Japon; 3D modelci, grafik tasarımcı, reklam ve pazarlamacı emektar iş hanımı ablalarımın.
過程不夠緊湊，太多冗長的跑地圖流程，還有明明取消小隊跟蹤，沒幾秒又會自動跟上來，在頂樓打砲船那邊根本叫他們送死

My name is Walter Hartwell White. I live at 308 Negra Arroyo Lane, Albuquerque, New Mexico, 87104. This is my confession. If you're watching this tape, I'm probably dead, murdered by my brother-in-law Hank Schrader. Hank has been building a meth empire for over a year now and using me as his chemist. Shortly after my 50th birthday, Hank came to me with a rather, shocking proposition. He asked that I use my chemistry knowledge to cook methamphetamine, which he would then sell using his connections in the drug world. Connections that he made through his career with the DEA. I was... astounded, I... I always thought that Hank was a very moral man and I was... thrown, confused, but I was also particularly vulnerable at the time, something he knew and took advantage of. I was reeling from a cancer diagnosis that was poised to bankrupt my family. Hank took me on a ride along, and showed me just how much money even a small meth operation could make. And I was weak. I didn't want my family to go into financial ruin so I agreed. Every day, I think back at that moment with regret. I quickly realized that I was in way over my head, and Hank had a partner, a man named Gustavo Fring, a businessman. Hank essentially sold me into servitude to this man, and when I tried to quit, Fring threatened my family. I didn't know where to turn.
Eventually, Hank and Fring had a falling out. From what I can gather, Hank was always pushing for a greater share of the business, to which Fring flatly refused to give him, and things escalated. Fring was able to arrange, uh I guess I guess you call it a "hit" on my brother-in-law, and failed, but Hank was seriously injured, and I wound up paying his medical bills which amounted to a little over $177,000. Upon recovery, Hank was bent on revenge, working with a man named Hector Salamanca, he plotted to kill Fring, and did so. In fact, the bomb that he used was built by me, and he gave me no option in it. I have often contemplated suicide, but I'm a coward. I wanted to go to the police, but I was frightened. Hank had risen in the ranks to become the head of the Albuquerque DEA, and about that time, to keep me in line, he took my children from me. For 3 months he kept them. My wife, who up until that point, had no idea of my criminal activities, was horrified to learn what I had done, why Hank had taken our children. We were scared. I was in Hell, I hated myself for what I had brought upon my family. Recently, I tried once again to quit, to end this nightmare, and in response, he gave me this. I can't take this anymore. I live in fear every day that Hank will kill me, or worse, hurt my family. I... All I could think to do was to make this video in hope that the world will finally see this man, for what he really is.

Важко не переоцінити той вплив, що мала ця гра на ігрову індустрію в момент виходу. В ній важко знайти мінуси, в усіх аспектах гра й досі дає приклад, як робляться справжні шедеври геймдеву. Вона презентувала революційний рушій [i]Source[/i], що показав реалістичну графіку та фізику, і на якому у майбутньому вийде безліч чудових проєктів.
[b]Безсумнівно, найкраща гра 2004 року та одна із найкращих ігор в історії.[/b]
Eski oyun olmasına rağmen aşırı sarıyor hala oynanabilir

"We are still waiting Half-life 3."

+ It's been 20 years since half-life 2 released, but this masterpiece still give us a fun.
+ It encompasses racing, horror, and FPS genres through various themes.
+ Creative solutions using unique weapons(gravity gun)

- The recoil of the gun is severe, making it difficult to engage in long-distance combat.
- Over-inserted puzzles to increase playtime.
- sometimes achievement system not working
- some prop provoke unexpected bug
Muy bueno para una digna secuela de un juegazo de antaño.
